subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Basketball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: With each attack on the rim, each sturdy defensive stand and each Suns playoff win, Amar’e Stoudemire’s stature is rising. So is his price.
snippet: With each attack on the rim, each sturdy defensive stand and each Suns playoff win, Amar’e Stoudemire’s stature is rising. So is his price.
